title: Create Talentblaze talent acquisition service website

requirements.text: Create a homepage with hero section introducing Talentblaze as a fractional talent acquisition service firm for startups in India and global firms establishing operations in India

quotes: create website of a fractional talent acquisition service firm by the name Talentblaze catering to startups in India and global firms trying to setup their firms in India

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays Talentblaze branding prominently
Clear value proposition for startups in India and global firms

requirements.text: Create an About section explaining the fractional talent acquisition model and how Talentblaze serves its target markets
acceptanceCriteria: Explains fractional talent acquisition concept clearly
Highlights benefits for startups and global firms
Professional tone appropriate for B2B services

requirements.text: Create a Services section outlining key talent acquisition offerings relevant to Indian startups and global firms entering India
acceptanceCriteria: Clearly differentiates services for each target segment
Includes visual elements to enhance readability

requirements.text: Create a Contact section with a contact form for potential clients to reach Talentblaze
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form captures name, email, company, and message
Form submission stores inquiries in backend

requirements.text: Implement backend storage for contact form submissions with fields for name, email, company name, and inquiry message
acceptanceCriteria: Data structure includes timestamp for each inquiry

requirements.text: Apply a professional, modern visual theme with warm, trustworthy colors (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography suitable for a B2B service brand, and cohesive spacing and layout patterns throughout all sections
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette using warm, professional tones
Layout maintains visual coherence across all sections
Design conveys trust and professionalism for business clients

nonGoals: Job board or applicant tracking features

required: Professional hero background image showing diverse business professionals collaborating in modern office setting (hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png)
Talentblaze logo design with modern, professional aesthetic suitable for B2B services (talentblaze-logo.dim_400x120.png)
